name: Extract Indicators (Alerts)
description: Extracts and creates indicators from the specified data and then enriches specific fields in alerts with the indicator data.

steps.name: Add Comment for Enrichment Not Complete

resource.content: Enrichment for the extracted indicators did not complete in the default wait time of 2 minutes. Some indicators still have a reputation as TBD.
Files {% for item in vars.steps.Extract_Attachment_Indicators['excluded_file_indicators'] %}{{item}}{% if not loop.last%}, {% endif %}{% endfor %} has been excluded from file indicator creation.

steps.name: Configuration
steps.description: You can customize extraction by modifying indicator map in configuration step

arguments.excluded_indicators: {{(vars.steps.Get_Exclude_IOCs_List | json_query("[? key == `sfsp-excludelist-urls` || key == `sfsp-excludelist-domains` || key == `sfsp-excludelist-ips`].jSONValue") | flatten(levels=1) | join(",") | lower).split(",")}}

steps.name: Extract Indicators from Body
steps.description: This is step is specifically designed for 'Suspicious Email' Alert

steps.name: Extract Indicators from Description
steps.description: This is step is specifically designed for 'Suspicious Email' Alert

steps.name: Extract Indicators from Header
steps.description: This is step is specifically designed for 'Suspicious Email' Alert

conditions.condition: {{ 'tenant' in vars.input.records[0] and vars.input.records[0].tenant.isDedicated and vars.input.records[0].tenant.role != 'self' }}

steps.name: Removing NULL Indicators
steps.description: Removing null indicators extracted from email

routes.name: Add Comment for Enrichment Not Complete -> Update Alert State
Are New Indicators Created -> Wait For Enrichment
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Configuration -> Update Indicator List
Create Indicator -> Link Alert Team to Indicators
Extract Attachment Indicators -> Unified Email IOCs
Extract Indicators from Body -> Extract Indicators from Description
Extract Indicators from Description -> Extract Attachment Indicators
Extract Indicators from Header -> Extract Indicators from Body
Get Exclude IOCs List -> Configuration
Get Indicators -> Extract Indicators from Header
Is Dedicated Tenant Record -> Find Exclude List IOCs
routes.label: No, Extract Here

routes.name: Is the record for a dedicated tenant -> Exit
routes.label: Yes, Extract at Tenant Node

routes.name: Link Alert Team to Indicators -> Are New Indicators Created
Removing NULL Indicators -> Create Indicator
Start -> Is Dedicated Tenant Record
Unified Email IOCs -> Removing NULL Indicators
Update Alert State -> Add Comment for Excluded Files
Update Indicator List -> Get Indicators
Wait For Enrichment -> Add Comment
Wait For Enrichment -> Update Alert State
Were New Indicators Created -> Update Alert State
routes.label: No
